name: Nathan RILEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, COUNTY OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Riley v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Nathan RILEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, COUNTY OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 80th day of January, 2013, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
61 A.3d 190
Nathan RILEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, COUNTY OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.
No. 196 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 30, 2013.
